突破性研究确定了小肽用于牛皮癣治疗伯明翰的科学家表明，当局部应用于润肤霜霜时，只有三个氨基酸的序列可能会降低牛皮癣的严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/breakthrough-research-indistifies-small-peptide-for-psoriasis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/breakthrough-research-indistifies-small-peptide-for-psoriasis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e9cc0c8-1b1f-4d24-9293-5517c3c9c9c94e Thu, 03 Apr 2025 12:22:19 -0400 Breakthrough research identifies small peptide for psoriasis treatment
罗格斯遗传学家发现了对多囊性肾脏疾病进展的新见解对于多囊性肾脏疾病（PKD）的患者来说，一种常见的遗传疾病，用囊肿，透析和移植的浪费器官破坏了浪费器官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/rutgers-geneticists--uncover-fresh-intoights-into-pologession-polycystic-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/rutgers-geneticists--uncover-fresh-ingights-into-pologession-polycystic-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c0f90E6-28B9-4F3E-824B-90E5702FBA10 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 10:05:27 -0400 Rutgers geneticists uncover fresh insights into progression of polycystic kidney disease

切换到西方饮食会触发炎症并削弱免疫力从传统的非洲饮食转换为西方饮食仅两周，就会引起炎症，减少对病原体的免疫反应，并激活与生活方式疾病相关的过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/switching-to-to-a-western-diet-triggers-inflammation-and-weakens-immunity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/switching-to-to-a-western-diet-triggers-inflammation-ind-weakens-weakens-immunity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0dcad179-99f6-4b6a-a176-0220c064244b Thu, 03 Apr 2025 09:02:47 -0400 Switching to a Western diet triggers inflammation and weakens immunity

NUZ-001在人类3D脑模型中显示阳性结果Neurizon Therapeutics Limited (“Neurizon”), a clinical-stage biotech company dedicated to advancing treatments for neurodegenerative diseases, is pleased to advise that results from an independent study undertaken in collaboration with Tessara Therapeutics (“Tessara”) will be presented by the group's Principal Scientist and Alzheimer's Disease expert, Dr Mark Greenough at the AD/PD 2025 Advances in 4月2日至3日的科学与治疗会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/nuz-001-shows-posisity-results-in-human-3d-brain-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/nuz-001-shows-posisity-results-in-human-3d-brain-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dee8acf6-25A-492F-9B7B-CD54A6CCDCE2 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 07:39:00 -0400 NUZ-001 shows positive results in human 3D brain model
